ConfirmDelete.Title: Delete Hidden Item
ConfirmDelete.Content: Are you sure you want to delete this hidden item? This action cannot be undone.

ConfirmClear.Title: Clear Hidden Items List
ConfirmClear.Content: Are you sure you want to clear the hidden items list? This action cannot be undone.

Notifications.LibWrapperRequired: The libWrapper module is required for Hidden Items to function properly. Please install and activate it.
Notifications.ListCleared: The hidden items list has been cleared.
Notifications.AlreadyHidden: {itemName} is already in the hidden items list.
Notifications.ItemDeleted: The hidden item has been deleted permanently.
